description: Poor Christian Wilde reports to Dr. John Magnum complaining of a problem keeping his dick hard. After an initial examination Dr. Magnum calls in the ED expert, Rod Daily. Both Magnum and Daily take turns sucking Wilde's cock, getting him rock hard with ease. Part two of the exam tests Wilde's ability to stay hard. Daily jumps up on the exam table and Dr. Magnum instructs Wilde to fuck him. Eventually both patient and doctor have fucked Daily until semen samples are collected all around!
title: Trust Me, I'm A Doctor, Scene #02
